::Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Scattershot/Scavanger/Breakdown/Hiss::

The Alliance members stop as they see the hologram, listening to what it has 
to stay. Reptilica steps forward, activating his comm.

"I don't think so, Magmatron," he says into it, sending the transmission at 
the Destron base, "We'll play by our rules. Here's the deal: you withdraw 
your forces from the Iron Fist, and we'll let ya live. You don't, we attack, 
eventually capture the base, and let Scattershot wear your troops' heads for 
hats."

Scattershot's eyes light up at the end of Reptilica's ultimatum, the insane 
bot hovering in the air, hoping that Magmatron (he thinks Magmatron is in the 
ship) would choose the second option.
